author: Murat Yülek
title: Parking Chinese EVs in the 'Fortress Europe' | Opinion
text:
by Murat Yülek Oct 25, 2024 - 12:05 am GMT+3 "The EV tension has come on top of the existing trade wars, with the U.S. and Europe on one side and China on the other." (Getty Images Photos) by Murat Yülek Oct 25, 2024 12:05 am As economic divisions and rivalries rise, the EU aims to protect its auto industry from rising Chinese EV competition, but will it succeed? EU members are discussing ways to slow down imports of Chinese electric vehicles. That is why they are talking about stronger protection measures to save uncompetitive European car manufacturers. The trade war between the EU and China may become even fiercer in the near future.
China has emerged as the global leader in electric vehicle production, benefiting from significant investments and advances in battery technology. American and European automakers have been facing increasing competition from China. Chinese electric vehicle (EV) manufacturers have an increasing appeal to consumers in North America and Europe as they often offer lower prices and rapidly expanding model ranges.
The EV tension has come on top of the existing trade wars, with the U.S. and Europe on one side and China on the other. European manufacturers in almost all tradable goods sectors have been complaining about increasing Chinese competition ever since China’s opening to world trade in 1978.
The welfare effects of Chinese integration into world markets have dominated the debate. Western consumers enjoyed increasing purchasing power of manufactured goods with any increase in their own productivity at home. The bonus came from low-salaried Chinese manpower who were also very hardworking. It was a win-win for both parties; Europe and the U.S. offered more and more consumables to their people without the latter having to work harder. For China, the newborn export dragon was an opportunity to provide relatively higher salary employment to its labor and thus increased welfare (which also bolstered obedience to the Communist Party) on the one hand. On the other, China received trillions of dollars of export revenues in hard currency over the last five decades and became the primary lender to the U.S.
Enriched China soon started to “buy out” high-debt countries in Europe (Portugal and Greece as well as Italy), Africa, Latin America and Asia. China’s political influence has been rising in tandem. Soon, the tensions started in the West. The governments in the U.S. and Europe have realized that growing trade deficits against China mean less employment and tax revenues on top of hard currency outflows. At the same time, their influence on their former colonies and elsewhere rapidly waned. More importantly, European and many American corporations could simply not compete with their Chinese counterparts. European and American governments soon started to pull the trigger by strengthening the protection policies. All this led to ever-rising tensions around trade policies, including tariffs and subsidies.
The European Union has been assessing ways to support its domestic car manufacturers in leveling the playing field in the automobile sector. Both Europe and China are investing heavily in R&D for EV technology. The top agenda item here is battery technology, the weakest aspect of electric vehicles. This race for innovation is the key to their respective strategies to dominate the EV market. However, it seems Europe will be unable to cope with the Chinese innovative power. That makes government help a necessity for European EV manufacturers to survive.
European authorities also use the handy tool of regulatory standards and environmental practices in their arsenal. European regulations aimed at reducing emissions are evolving, and there are discussions about aligning standards with global practices. These non-tariff (or “ghost”) barriers have been common practice in the political toolkit of the EU in erecting the “Fortress Europe,” which symbolizes a European domestic market that is supposed to be open to competition internally but protected forcefully against outsiders like China.
Thus, the EV crisis between China and Europe primarily revolves around competition, market access and regulatory standards. The natural route seems to be an ever-hardening economic war between the two parties. The results of the U.S. elections will also have a bearing. If Donald Trump wins the U.S. elections, China will have to fight on two fronts and things may turn more nasty.
About the author An accomplished author, former IMF economist and academic, with teaching experience at Georgetown and Columbia University shortlink copied RELATED TOPICS fight-against-terrorism DEUTSCHE-BANK US-LIBYA-RELATIONS KEYWORDS ev batteries electric vehicle us-china trade war electric cars The Daily Sabah Newsletter Keep up to date with what’s happening in Turkey, it’s region and the world. author: Guest
title: Duane Barton Weisenhaus Sr
text:
May 19, 1931 - July 8, 2025
Duane Barton Weisenhaus Sr, age 94, of Mauston, WI, passed away peacefully on July 8, 2025, at his home. He earlier lived in Necedah and in the Chicago area.
He was born on May 19, 1931, in Warroad, MN, to the late Otto and Minnie (Ohlin) Weisenhaus. He was a devoted husband, father, grandfather, and great-grandfather with a long and distinguished record of personal, professional and civic achievement. He is survived by his second wife, Patricia (Bartow) Weisenhaus, whom he married in 2007.
He was preceded in death in 1998 by his first wife, Armida (Campos) Weisenhaus. His survivors include their five children: Deborah Weisenhaus, Doreen (Gene Mustain) Weisenhaus, Darlene (Terry) Hansen, Duane Weisenhaus Jr. and Darrell Weisenhaus; as well as six grandchildren and 21 great-grandchildren.
Other survivors include his sister, Marlene (Ken) Roland; three stepchildren: James Paffenroth, Kathy (Tim) Deneen and Scott (Larisa) Paffenroth; eight step-grandchildren; and 11 step-great-grandchildren.
Duane left the small farm where he was born and moved to Chicago when he was a teenager. He graduated in 1949 from Crane Technical High School and then in 1962 obtained a bachelor's degree in electrical engineering from Chicago Technical College. He worked for the Honeywell Corporation as a project engineer responsible for fire control and security systems for refineries and power plants.
He also served in the National Guard and US Army Reserve, achieving the rank of sergeant and qualifying as an expert marksman and instructor. He served as a member and then president of a local school board in Mundelein, IL. He also earned a pilot's license.
After retiring from Honeywell, Duane pursued many interests, including photography, woodworking, birdwatching and painstakingly curating a large library of binders documenting the lives of multiple family generations.
He and Patricia were Master Gardeners who enjoyed traveling. They became a familiar presence at the Moose Lodge in Mauston, where both served in leadership and volunteer roles.
Duane will be remembered by his family for building an endless legacy of family love and support that extends across all its branches and generations.
Visitation will be Saturday, July 19, 2025 from 10:00 to 11:00 a.m., followed by services at 11:00 a.m., and a military honor salute at the Bethany Lutheran Church, 701 Grove St., Mauston. A luncheon will be held at the church from 11:45 a.m., to 2:00 p.m. Interment will follow at Bayview Cemetery in Necedah. The Torkelson Funeral Home in Necedah is assisting the family with arrangements. Online condolences may be offered at www.torkelsonfuneralhome.com.

author: Ramiz Mikayıloğlu
title: Official reception was held in honor of the President of Azerbaijan on behalf of President of Pakistan
text: On July 12, an official reception was held in honor of the President of the Republic of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev on behalf of the President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari in Islamabad, [APA](https://apa.az)'s correspondent assigned to Islamabad reports. Official reception was held in honor of the President of Azerbaijan on behalf of President of Pakistan 12 July 2024 11:49 (UTC +04:00) On July 12, an official reception was held in honor of the President of the Republic of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev on behalf of the President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari in Islamabad, [İDMAN XƏBƏR](https://apasport.az/) Official news [](https://en.apa.az/official-news/azerbaijani-president-held-expanded-meeting-with-president-of-pakistan-in-islamabad-updated-442534) Azerbaijani President held expanded meeting with President of Pakistan in Islamabad -UPDATED 10:54 12 July 2024 [](https://en.apa.az/official-news/president-ilham-aliyev-azerbaijan-and-pakistan-support-each-other-on-every-international-case-442514) President Ilham Aliyev: Azerbaijan and Pakistan support each other on every international case 01:58 12 July 2024 [](https://en.apa.az/official-news/president-ilham-aliyev-and-prime-minister-muhammad-shehbaz-sharif-made-press-statements-updated-442469) President Ilham Aliyev and Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif made press statements-UPDATED 01:15 12 July 2024 [](https://en.apa.az/official-news/president-of-azerbaijan-ilham-aliyev-held-expanded-meeting-with-prime-minister-of-pakistan-muhammad-shehbaz-sharif-in-islamabad-updated-1-442466) President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev held expanded meeting with Prime Minister of Pakistan Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif in Islamabad-UPDATED-1 23:40 11 July 2024

author: @shanghaiist
title: Strategies to Achieve Millionaire Status with Solana at $200
text: - Solana (SOL) has experienced a remarkable surge, with its price increasing by nearly 1000% since January 2023, peaking at $123.68 before a recent correction to around $100. Despite a 6.4% correction in the past day, SOL remains one of the top-performing cryptocurrencies, surpassing even Bitcoin’s 160% rise this year. - To become a millionaire with SOL priced at $200, an investor would need 5000 tokens, which currently cost about $523,000. Solana’s potential to reach this value is supported by its previous all-time high of $259.96 from November 2021, and analysts predict a bull market in 2024 could push SOL towards or beyond this peak. - Despite the optimistic outlook, predictions from platforms like Changelly suggest that SOL might not hit the $200 mark until at least October 2025, with expectations for the token to remain near $100 for most of 2024. The forecast could change if a bull market emerges next year, but the impact of a spot Bitcoin ETF approval remains uncertain. With its impressive performance in 2023, Solana (SOL) has become a standout cryptocurrency, riding a wave of nearly 1000% growth since January. Despite a recent 6.4% correction and a drop to around $100, SOL’s performance remains strong, even outpacing Bitcoin’s 160% rise over the same period. Millionaire Dreams: Investing in Solana for Future Gains To reach a net worth of one million dollars with SOL valued at $200, an investor would need to possess 5,000 tokens. This quantity of SOL currently costs approximately $523,000, assuming recent price levels. Path to $200: Solana’s Potential Trajectory - Solana’s all-time high reached $259.96 in November 2021, making the $200 target a plausible future milestone. - Optimism for 2024 is fueled by predictions of a bull market, potential Bitcoin ETF approval, and the Bitcoin halving event in April. However, predictions from platforms like [Changelly](https://changelly.com/blog/solana-price-prediction/) suggest a more conservative timeline, with SOL not expected to hit $200 until at least October 2025. The forecast for 2024 places SOL around the $100 mark but acknowledges that a shift to a bull market could alter these expectations.

author: Poster
title: From Illness to Wellness: The Function of Prayer in Recovery
text:
Prayer is a universal practice that has belonged of human culture for centuries. It is a method for individuals to connect with a greater power, seek guidance, and discover solace in times of requirement. Prayer holds great importance in different cultures and religious beliefs around the globe, working as a way of communication with the divine. Beyond its spiritual significance, prayer has also been recognized for its possible to promote physical, psychological, and spiritual healing.
Prayer has the power to recover not only because it is a kind of interaction with a higher power, however also due to the fact that it can bring about a sense of peace, convenience, and hope. In times of illness or distress, prayer can offer individuals with a sense of purpose and significance, helping them discover strength and strength. It can likewise act as a source of psychological support and connection, as individuals come together in prayer neighborhoods to use their intentions and support one another.
The Connection between Spirituality and Health
There is a growing body of research that suggests a strong link between spirituality and health. Studies have shown that people who take part in spiritual practices, such as prayer, tend to have better physical health outcomes. They have lower rates of persistent diseases, faster healing times from diseases, and improved general wellness.
Spirituality also plays a considerable function in mental and emotional wellness. Prayer can provide individuals with a sense of peace and calmness, reducing tension levels and promoting relaxation. It can likewise help individuals manage tough feelings and discover meaning in tough circumstances. In addition, prayer has actually been discovered to promote positive thinking and psychological well-being by cultivating thankfulness, forgiveness, and compassion.
Historic and Cultural Point Of Views on Prayer and Recovery
The practice of prayer as a healing tool has deep historic roots. Throughout history, prayer has actually been an integral part of conventional medicine and recovery practices in various cultures worldwide. In ancient civilizations, such as Egypt, Greece, and China, prayer was utilized along with natural remedies and other healing strategies to promote physical and spiritual healing.
In many cultures, prayer holds fantastic cultural significance. It is viewed as a way to connect with forefathers, look for guidance from deities, and keep consistency with the natural world. Prayer routines are often carried out in spiritual spaces or during particular times of the year to honor and invoke divine intervention. These cultural practices highlight the belief in the power of prayer to cause recovery and repair.
Scientific Proof on the Benefits of Prayer for Health
Scientific studies have been conducted to check out the prospective advantages of prayer for health. While the outcomes are blended, there is proof to suggest that prayer can have positive effects on physical health outcomes. For example, research studies have revealed that prayer can lower blood pressure, improve immune function, and boost general wellness.
Prayer has actually likewise been found to have a substantial impact on reducing tension levels and promoting relaxation. When individuals engage in prayer, they enter a state of deep focus and concentration, which can help soothe the mind and body.
powerful prayer for healing can result in a reduction in tension hormonal agents and an increase in feelings of peace and serenity.
Different Forms of Prayer and Their Healing Impacts
Prayer takes lots of kinds and can be practiced in various ways depending on an individual's beliefs and preferences. Some typical types of prayer consist of spoken prayers, silent prayers, meditation, shouting, and visualization. Each form of prayer has its own unique recovery effects on the mind, body, and spirit.
Spoken prayers involve speaking or reciting particular words or expressions to communicate with a higher power. This form of prayer can offer individuals with a sense of comfort and connection as they reveal their objectives and desires. Quiet prayers, on the other hand, include quiet contemplation or reflection without verbalizing thoughts or objectives. This kind of prayer enables people to listen for guidance and connect with their inner selves.
Meditation is another powerful type of prayer that includes focusing the mind and going into a state of deep relaxation. Through meditation, individuals can cultivate a sense of mindfulness and existence, permitting them to connect with their spiritual selves and discover inner peace. Chanting and visualization are likewise forms of prayer that can promote healing by creating a sense of consistency and balance within the mind, body, and spirit.
The Role of Faith and Belief in Prayer for Healing
Faith and belief play a vital function in prayer for recovery. When individuals believe the power of prayer and believe in the possibility of healing, they are most likely to experience favorable outcomes. This is since faith and belief can affect an individual's mindset, promoting positive thinking and visualization.
Favorable thinking is a necessary component of prayer for recovery. When individuals preserve a favorable frame of mind, they are more likely to experience feelings of hope, optimism, and durability. This favorable mindset can have a profound influence on physical health results by decreasing tension levels, enhancing immune function, and promoting overall wellness.
Belief in the power of prayer likewise extends beyond the individual. When people come together in prayer neighborhoods or seek support from others, their cumulative faith can produce a powerful recovery energy. This sense of neighborhood and support can provide people with a sense of belonging and connection, boosting the recovery procedure.
Prayer as a Complementary Treatment for Illnesses
Prayer can work as a complementary therapy alongside standard medical treatments for different diseases. While it is not a replacement for healthcare, prayer can boost the healing process by promoting relaxation, reducing tension levels, and offering emotional assistance.
For people with persistent diseases, prayer can be especially beneficial. It can assist people manage the obstacles of living with a long-term condition by offering them with a sense of function and significance. Prayer can likewise assist handle pain and other signs connected with chronic diseases, enhancing overall lifestyle.
Conquering Barriers to Prayer for Healing
Regardless of the prospective benefits of prayer for recovery, there prevail barriers that people might deal with. These barriers can include doubts about the effectiveness of prayer, absence of time or motivation, and feelings of unworthiness or guilt. However, there are methods that people can utilize to overcome these barriers and include prayer into their lives.
One technique is to start small and gradually develop a prayer practice. Reserving a few minutes each day for prayer can help people establish a routine and make prayer a regular part of their lives. It is likewise crucial to find a peaceful and peaceful space where individuals can focus their attention and get in touch with their spiritual selves.
Another method is to seek assistance and guidance from others. Signing up with a prayer community or seeking guidance from a spiritual leader can provide individuals with the motivation and responsibility they need to maintain a constant prayer practice. It is also essential to practice self-care and self-compassion, acknowledging that prayer is an individual journey that might develop with time.
The Significance of Mindfulness and Meditation in Prayer for Healing
Mindfulness and meditation are important parts of prayer for recovery. These practices can assist individuals cultivate a sense of existence, focus, and awareness, allowing them to get in touch with their spiritual selves more deeply.
Mindfulness involves paying attention to the present moment without judgment. By practicing mindfulness throughout prayer, individuals can end up being more aware of their ideas, emotions, and physical sensations. This awareness can assist people release diversions and enter a state of deep relaxation and connection with the divine.
Meditation is another effective practice that can improve prayer for healing. Through meditation, individuals can peaceful the mind, cultivate inner peace, and open themselves as much as divine guidance. Meditation can likewise assist individuals establish a sense of appreciation, compassion, and forgiveness, promoting emotional well-being and recovery.
Prayer and its Impact on Emotional and Mental Well-being
Prayer has an extensive impact on emotional and psychological well-being. It can supply people with a sense of comfort, hope, and peace, minimizing sensations of anxiety, depression, and tension. Prayer can likewise promote strength and coping skills, assisting individuals browse tough feelings and scenarios.
When people take part in prayer, they have the ability to reveal their inmost desires, fears, and hopes. This act of self-expression can be cathartic and healing, allowing people to release negative emotions and find solace in the presence of a greater power. Prayer can also offer people with a sense of purpose and meaning, assisting them find strength and resilience in difficult times.
Incorporating Prayer into Your Journey to Wellness
Integrating prayer into one's life can have profound results on physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being. By recognizing the power of prayer in promoting healing and health, individuals can cultivate a much deeper connection with their spiritual selves and find solace in times of requirement.
Techniques for integrating prayer into every day life consist of reserving devoted time for prayer, finding a quiet and serene space for reflection, seeking assistance from others, and practicing self-care and self-compassion. It is likewise important to remember that prayer is a personal journey that might evolve over time. Looking for guidance from spiritual leaders or signing up with prayer communities can offer people with the support and support they require to keep a constant prayer practice.
Eventually, prayer has the prospective to promote holistic health and healing by cultivating a sense of peace, connection, and hope. By integrating prayer into one's journey to health, individuals can take advantage of their self-confidence and discover solace in the presence of a higher power.

author: archyde
title: MotoAmerica MiniSBK Canada Mini Cup Qualifiers: Roadracing World Magazine Report
text:
MotoAmerica Partners with MiniSBK Canada for 2025 Qualifiers motoamerica, the leading motorcycle road racing series in North America, is expanding its reach by
hosting two Mini Cup qualifying rounds in Canada. The events, a collaboration with MiniSBK Canada,
will take place at Shannonville Motorsports Park in Shannonville, Ontario.
Mark your calendars: the qualifiers are scheduled for June 13-14 and July 4-5 ,
coinciding with rounds three and four of the MiniSBK series.This provides a unique chance
for young Canadian racers to compete for a coveted spot in the Mission Mini Cup National Final,
held annually at Road America in Elkhart Lake, Wisconsin, from August 8-10 .
Shannonville: A Track Steeped in Racing History Shannonville Motorsports park,proudly known as the “Birthplace of Champions As 1974,” brings
meaningful prestige to the qualifying rounds. The track is a mainstay in Canadian motorsports,
regularly hosting a round of the Canadian Superbike Championship. Its history and reputation make
it an ideal venue for nurturing the next generation of racing talent.
Toni Sharpless: Leading the Charge at MiniSBK canada MiniSBK Canada is helmed by Toni sharpless, a celebrated figure in the racing world. Inducted into
the Canadian Motorcycle Hall of Fame in 2011, Sharpless is also notable for being one of the few
women to qualify for and finish the prestigious Daytona 200 back in 1987. Her experience and
leadership promise well for the success of the qualifiers.
A Pathway to the National Stage These qualifying races offer a direct route for young Canadian racers to participate in the Mission
Mini Cup National Final at Road America. The competition will span six classes, ensuring a wide
range of age groups and skill levels are represented:
Class Age Range Stock 50 6-8 years Stock 110 8-12 years GP 110 8-12 years GP 160 10-14 years GP 190 10-14 years Street GP 14 years and up Quotes from the Top: Aksland and Sharpless on the Partnership MotoAmerica COO Chuck Aksland expressed his enthusiasm for the collaboration, stating:
MotoAmerica is thrilled to be working with MiniSBK to bring two of our Mini Cup Qualifiers to
Canada. I guess you could say we’re going international, which is remarkable considering this
is just our second year of the qualifiers and national Final. Canada has always produced
top-level racers, some of whom have won AMA championships, and we’re sure there will be some
fast kids who make it down for our National final at Road America.
Chuck Aksland, MotoAmerica COO
Toni Sharpless echoed this sentiment, highlighting the importance for Canadian youth:
I was surprised and honored to receive the call from Wayne Rainey and Chuck Aksland, two
individuals I remember from my racing days in the 1980s. When they asked if our MiniSBK
Championship series would be interested in joining the MotoAmerica Mini Cup Qualifier series,
it took me less than a minute to consider and say ‘Yes.’ This connection further expands the
opportunities we provide for Canadian youth in the sport. We are happy and proud to be part of
another big step toward grassroots advancement in road racing.
Toni Sharpless, MiniSBK CEO
Expanding opportunities for Young Racers This partnership underscores a commitment to fostering young talent in motorcycle racing. By
extending the MotoAmerica Mini Cup series into Canada, more young racers gain access to
high-quality competition and a pathway to national recognition. This move could perhaps mirror
the success of programs like the Red Bull motogp Rookies Cup, which identifies and develops young
talent on a global scale, hoping to discover the next Marc Marquez or Valentino Rossi from the
North American continent.
Potential Challenges and Considerations While the expansion is undoubtedly positive, logistical challenges may arise for Canadian racers
looking to compete at Road America. Travel costs, equipment transportation, and potential visa
requirements could present obstacles. However,the opportunity to race on a national stage often
outweighs these concerns for aspiring champions and their families.
What’s Next? As the June qualifiers approach, anticipation is building. This initiative promises to inject fresh
talent into the MotoAmerica Mini Cup series and strengthen the ties between the U.S. and Canadian
racing communities. Keep an eye on Shannonville Motorsports Park this summer for a glimpse of the
future stars of motorcycle racing. The U.S. racing scene is hoping to cultivate talent that can
one day compete with the European dominance in MotoGP, the premier class of motorcycle racing.

What are the different age groups and class categories for the MotoAmerica Mini cup qualifiers hosted by MiniSBK Canada?
Archyde Interviews Toni Sharpless on MotoAmerica Mini Cup Canada Published: March 19, 2025
Archyde News recently sat down with Toni Sharpless, CEO of MiniSBK Canada, to discuss the exciting new partnership with MotoAmerica for the Mini Cup series.
Interview with Toni sharpless Archyde: Toni, thank you for joining us. We’re thrilled about the MotoAmerica Mini Cup qualifiers coming to Canada. Can you tell us how this collaboration with MiniSBK Canada came about?
toni Sharpless: Thank you for having me. It was quite a surprise and an honor to receive a call from Wayne Rainey and Chuck Aksland. These are names I remember from my racing days! When they proposed the partnership, it was an instant ‘yes.’ We knew this would create incredible opportunities for young Canadian racers.
Expanding Opportunities for Young Riders Archyde: absolutely. This really opens doors for young Canadian racers. These qualifiers lead to the final at Road America,that must be incredibly exciting for the kids. Can you elaborate on the impact this will have on the growth of young racing talent, that is a primary focus of the MiniSBK series, correct?
Toni Sharpless: Precisely! This is the core of what we do. This partnership provides a clear pathway to a national level of competition. These qualifying races will give youth from the North American continent the chance to be showcased on the world racing stage. To actually compete with the best young racers in the U.S. is a huge step forward. Seeing our young riders compete against their peers on a national stage is a fantastic opportunity for them to see their racing abilities in relation to global competition.”
Shannonville as the Perfect Venue Archyde: Shannonville Motorsports park is slated to host the qualifiers. It’s reputation speaks for itself. Why was Shannonville chosen as the host track?
Toni Sharpless: Shannonville is fantastic! It’s a track steeped in Canadian racing history, known as the “Birthplace of Champions.” also, it regularly hosts a round of the Canadian Superbike Championship, so it’s perfect for young aspiring racers. The historical recognition of the race track helps to provide a positive racing feel.
Series Classes and Competition Archyde: The Mini Cup series has various classes. Can you outline the different classes and age ranges participating in the qualifiers?
Toni Sharpless: Certainly! The classes are designed to ensure a diverse range of ages and skill levels,as you know.We will have the Stock 50 class for ages 6-8, Stock 110 for 8-12, GP 110 for 8-12, GP 160 and GP 190 for 10-14 year olds, and the Street GP for those 14 and up. We anticipate a great turnout!
Addressing challenges and Looking Ahead Archyde: I was just thinking about the logistics surrounding the races, transportation, and the travel from Canada, especially concerning travel and transporting of race vehicles. Do you anticipate any challenges for Canadian racers competing that will be addressed?
Toni Sharpless: While travel costs and customs can be hurdles,the opportunity to race at Road america often outweighs them. We are working closely with MotoAmerica to provide as much support as possible to help families navigate these challenges. It will be a big step for all racers.
A Potential for Global Competition Archyde: This collaboration could inspire the next generation of Canadian motorcycle racing talent. Looking forward, how do you see this impacting Canadian motorsports?
toni Sharpless: We believe it will have a notable impact. This kind of exposure and opportunity for talented young racers could lead to Canadian riders competing in global series, similar to the success of the Red Bull MotoGP Rookies cup. That would be a fantastic legacy to leave for the next generations. We are just getting started!
Exciting Prospects for Racers Archyde: That is the hope.The qualifiers are in June and July, and it seems the wait is just beginning. Thank you, Toni, for sharing your insights; we are very excited about what this collaboration can bring. Let’s end on this: What is the one thing that you want young racers to know about this opportunity?
Toni Sharpless: Never give up! This is an incredible chance to showcase your skills and passion for racing. Embrace the challenge, work hard, and believe in yourselves. The dream of competing on a national stage is within reach!
Archyde: Fantastic words of wisdom from the MiniSBK CEO. Thank you again, Toni. Keep up the great work!

author: 证星财报解析
title: 九华旅游（603199）2025年一季报财务简析：营收净利润同比双双增长_股票频道_证券之星
text:
据证券之星公开数据整理，近期九华旅游（603199）发布2025年一季报。根据财报显示，九华旅游营收净利润同比双双增长。截至本报告期末，公司营业总收入2.35亿元，同比上升30.13%，归母净利润6865.86万元，同比上升31.83%。按单季度数据看，第一季度营业总收入2.35亿元，同比上升30.13%，第一季度归母净利润6865.86万元，同比上升31.83%。
本次财报公布的各项数据指标表现尚佳。其中，毛利率54.6%，同比减0.15%，净利率29.27%，同比增1.3%，销售费用、管理费用、财务费用总计3319.29万元，三费占营收比14.15%，同比减8.82%，每股净资产14.3元，同比增7.7%，每股经营性现金流0.24元，同比增257.55%，每股收益0.62元，同比增31.81%
证券之星价投圈财报分析工具显示： 业务评价： 公司去年的ROIC为12.53%，近年资本回报率强。公司业绩具有周期性。去年的净利率为24.33%，算上全部成本后，公司产品或服务的附加值高。 融资分红： 公司上市10年以来，累计融资总额3.34亿元，累计分红总额3.01亿元，分红融资比为0.9。
分析师工具显示：证券研究员普遍预期2025年业绩在2.12亿元，每股收益均值在1.92元。
持有九华旅游最多的基金为光大消费主题股票A，目前规模为1.68亿元，最新净值1.0663（4月23日），较上一交易日下跌0.79%，近一年上涨0.2%。该基金现任基金经理为马鹏飞。
最近有知名机构关注了公司以下问题：
问：银发旅游市场上有没有具体的布局措施
答：尊敬的投资者，您好！针对银发旅游市场，公司积极响应安徽省“全龄服务、全链布局、全域统筹”政策导向，依托池州“富硒生态+负氧山水+禅修文化”三大核心资源和公司产业链优势，积极策划诗歌文化、戏曲文化、农耕文化、非遗手工、特色餐饮等旅游主题，开发体验性强、参与度广的精品旅居路线和养老产品。
以上内容为证券之星据公开信息整理，由智能算法生成（网信算备310104345710301240019号），不构成投资建议。
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news
Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance
Economy, Business and Finance->tourism and leisure industry

author: globo.com
title: Carlos Alcaraz perde para holandês e é eliminado do US Open | tênis | ge
text:
Carlos Alcaraz está fora do US Open. O espanhol, número 3 do mundo, perdeu para o holandês Botic Van de Zandschulp por 3 sets a 0, em 2h21, com parciais de 6/1, 7/5 e 6/4. O adversário da próxima fase é o britânico Jack Draper, que mais cedo eliminou o argentino Facundo Diaz Acosta.
O holandês começou melhor, conseguindo uma quebra de serviço logo no segundo game. Como confirmou o seu saque seguinte, o placar foi a 3/0, deixando Alcaraz numa posição desconfortável. Irreconhecível, o espanhol viu o rival fazer 5/1 e ter três set points no sétimo game. E numa devolução para fora do número 3 do mundo, Boticvan de Zandschulp fechou o primeiro set em 6/1.
1 de 2 Carlos Alcaraz foi dominado no primeiro set — Foto: REUTERS/Andrew Kelly Carlos Alcaraz foi dominado no primeiro set — Foto: REUTERS/Andrew Kelly
O panorama do jogo continuou o mesmo no início do segundo set. Errando muito, Alcaraz viu o holandês quebrar o seu serviço mais uma vez, marcando 2/1. No game seguinte, porém, o espanhol devolveu a quebra, finalmente acordando na partida. Só que, minutos depois, De Zandschulp obteve nova quebra, passando a sacar para o set: 6/5. Sem forças para reagir, Alcaraz não conseguiu evitar a derrota por 7/5 na parcial.
2 de 2 Zandschulp vibra com a vitória no segundo set — Foto: REUTERS/Andrew Kelly Zandschulp vibra com a vitória no segundo set — Foto: REUTERS/Andrew Kelly
O terceiro set foi mais equilibrado, mas o holandês continuou atuando em alto nível. No momento decisivo da parcial, conseguiu uma quebra e fechou o set com 6/4.
Carlos Alcaraz brinca com Jannik Sinner durante treino
